title: Geriatric Park
description: The tale of genetics gone haywire in a retirement community.
altHero: a giant rubber walker foot next to a theme park Jeep in the rain
alt1: two kids shine a flashlight at two cups of water
alt2: two kids cry and scream inside a rainy Jeep window
alt3: looking up at a giant old man in a raincoat holding a walker
alt4: a paleontologist waves a flare in the rain next to a sign that says “Seisure World”
